item.title: Differences Between AI and Machine Learning and Why it Matters
item.description: Differences Between AI and Machine Learning and Why it Matters [ read more ] Unfortunately, some tech organizations are deceiving customers by proclaiming using AI on their technologies… 13 min read Word2Vec - a baby step in Deep Learning but a giant leap towards Natural… [ read more ] Let’s demystify word2vec with reasoning, examples and mathematics 10 min read Report on Text Classification using CNN, RNN & HAN [ read more ] Experimenting with various neural networks architectures.
